Each tribe is also devoted to six different kinds of music -- funk, country, techno, classical, pop and rock. When rockers Queen Barb and King Thrash set out to destroy the other music, Poppy and Branch embark on a daring mission to unite the trolls and save the diverse melodies from becoming extinct.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: In an act of clumsiness, Timeti breaks the scepter belonging to Ramana, who is teaching her to become a shaman. She tries to cover her blunder with a crude repair job. However, when Ramana performs the ritual to call the dolphins, he starts to act… like a dolphin! He swims and clicks like Zoom. The alarmed villagers try to find some solution. Timeti has to make up for her mistake without arousing their suspicions.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Billy, a baby orca born in captivity, is handed over to Uncle Patrick to prepare him for a return to the wild. However, Billy is high-spirited and playful and creates havoc in the village. Papa-Tuanaku gives Patrick a short deadline to get the orca ready to fend for himself far from human beings. Yann, Zoom and their friends have to teach him how to fish for himself and not go too close to sharks--the sworn enemies of orcas. Fortunately, Zoom is on hand to "support" Billy through his difficult apprenticeship.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: When Yann, Auru, Marina and Timeti decide to spend the night under the stars, their attention is grabbed by strange lights in the sky. When they see the lights plummet down off the coast of Maotou, our heroes decide to go see what it is and discover an incredible alien-like creature! Yann and his friends need to discover the truth about this weird phenomenon quickly before panic seizes Maotou.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Clarissa, Van Krook"s niece, arrives to spend the vacation aboard her uncle"s yacht. But she"s bored and dreams of making new friends. programme.desc: In an act of clumsiness, Timeti breaks the scepter belonging to Ramana, who is teaching her to become a shaman. She tries to cover her blunder with a crude repair job. However, when Ramana performs the ritual to call the dolphins, he starts to act… like a dolphin! He swims and clicks like Zoom. The alarmed villagers try to find some solution. Timeti has to make up for her mistake without arousing their suspicions.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Billy, a baby orca born in captivity, is handed over to Uncle Patrick to prepare him for a return to the wild. However, Billy is high-spirited and playful and creates havoc in the village. Papa-Tuanaku gives Patrick a short deadline to get the orca ready to fend for himself far from human beings. Yann, Zoom and their friends have to teach him how to fish for himself and not go too close to sharks--the sworn enemies of orcas. Fortunately, Zoom is on hand to "support" Billy through his difficult apprenticeship.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: When Yann, Auru, Marina and Timeti decide to spend the night under the stars, their attention is grabbed by strange lights in the sky. When they see the lights plummet down off the coast of Maotou, our heroes decide to go see what it is and discover an incredible alien-like creature! Yann and his friends need to discover the truth about this weird phenomenon quickly before panic seizes Maotou.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Clarissa, Van Krook"s niece, arrives to spend the vacation aboard her uncle"s yacht. But she"s bored and dreams of making new friends. She then meets Yann and Zoom and falls under Yann"s charm. Yann introduces her to Timeti and Auru. They don"t yet know that she is the niece of their sworn enemy. Clarissa does all she can to prevent her new friends from finding out.

programme.title: SESAME STREET: THE MONSTER AT THE END OF THIS STORY
programme.desc: An animated special based on the beloved book, "Monster at the End of this Book."

programme.title: HAPPILY EVER AFTER: FAIRY TALES FOR EVERY CHILD S3
programme.desc: Ali Baba is a young Arabian girl who outsmarts the Great One and his forty thieves.

programme.title: ALVIN AND THE CHIPMUNKS
programme.desc: An aspiring composer is befriended by three talented chipmunks that not only talk, but sing too.

programme.title: ALVIN AND THE CHIPMUNKS: THE SQUEAKQUEL
programme.desc: After a concert mishap, the singing chipmunks take a break from superstardom and go to school to fit in with kids their age.

programme.title: SESAME STREET S47
programme.desc: Cookie Monster learns how to control himself from eating his own paintings.

programme.title: SESAME STREET S47
programme.desc: While Big Bird plays with Elmo and Abby’s friend, Julia, he notices that she does things a little differently. They come together to play and sing, celebrating how everyone is special and amazing.

programme.title: BEN 10 CLASSIC S1
programme.desc: Ben"s fear of clowns emerges at an unfortunate time when our heroes stumble upon a wicked circus with a "psychic vampire" clown named Zomobozo as its ringmaster.

programme.title: BEN 10 CLASSIC S1
programme.desc: Ben battles Hexlord, an evil sorcerer whose power emanates from several mystic charms--one of which falls into Gwen"s possession after the battle.

programme.title: ADVENTURE TIME S1
programme.desc: A magical man turns Finn into a foot. They meet others who have been similarly wronged and must work together.

programme.title: ADVENTURE TIME S1
programme.desc: Finn goes to great lengths to catch the evil Duke of Nuts, only to discover he"s not such a bad guy after all.

programme.title: ADVENTURE TIME S1
programme.desc: In an attempt to save a village, Finn and Jake rehabilitate Donny the Ogre, who"s a real jerk.

programme.title: ADVENTURE TIME S1
programme.desc: While trying to rescue a helpless stranger, Finn becomes Marceline"s slave.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Igor, the dolphin soldier, is back. Auru, who formed a special bond with him, is undoubtedly the happiest to see him again. However, joy quickly turns to concern when Igor takes Zoom off with him. He wants to show him something: the sonars of the dolphins living around the island are disturbed and they end up beaching themselves. Even Zoom is affected by this strange sickness. Time is short so Yann and his friends need to discover the cause quickly.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Yann discovers a Maui dolphin that appears to be lost and starving. It"s an extremely rare species and, not knowing anything about its diet, Yann decides to use a engine designed by himself to create a robot capable of observing fellow dolphins to discover what they eat. However, perhaps Yann should have listened to Uncle Patrick"s warnings that his engine might be too dangerous?

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Marina has brought her little friends back to the Galleon and she"s delighted with the idea of showing them her toys. But the kids only have eyes for Yann. So, to show off, Marina persuades them that she knows how to pilot the "Turtle", Uncle Patrick"s submersible. She offers to give them a tour, but the little gang gets stuck inside and they head off of a thrill-packed tour of the Maotou abyss. Yann, Zoom and friends have to intervene fast to get them out of the jam.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Jack returns to Maotou in his seaplane accompanied by Jackpot, a little dog he"s adopted. However, following a technical mishap, his plane crashes into the sea. Jack manages to get to a desert island, but Jackpot has disappeared. Fortunately, he is found by Zoom, who returns him to Yann and friends. Jackpot turns out to be a real whirlwind. Will our heroes realize that Jack is his owner and that he needs rescuing?

programme.desc: A hardened CIA operative finds himself at the mercy of a precocious 9-year-old girl, having been sent undercover to surveil her family.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Timeti"s mother, Maeva, has great news for her daughter. Timeti"s been accepted into a top cooking school. She will be leaving Maotou to become a great chef. But Timeti isn"t sure she really wants to do that. At a loss, she seeks support from Yann, but, due to a misunderstanding, Yann actually precipitates Timeti"s departure. He"s left with no choice: he has to declare his feelings in the hope that she will stay.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: For some days now, the waters of Maotou have been disturbed. Yann is concerned and decides to alert Papa-Tuanaku. When he gets to the village he discovers Clarissa, Van Krook"s niece, handing out gadgets to the villagers. Hypnotized by their tablets, they don"t listen to Yann when he tries to warn them of an ecological disaster threatening the atoll"s beaches. Could there be some connection between this phenomenon and these new gifts?

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: A bizarre phenomenon is creating panic in Maotou"s waters. At a precise location, airplanes" electronics go haywire and huge whirlpools almost suck in ships. Yann and his friends decide to investigate. Auru is convinced that it"s all his fault because he ate the offerings intended for Tumura Ifenua, the octopus-goddess who slumbers in the darkest depths of Maotou.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Biff and Rico have had enough of Van Krook"s never-ending insults. This time, they"re handing in their notice! They go to see Maeva, who"s gone into the home-delivered meal business and offer their services as delivery men. Maeva hesitates, but finally gives them a second chance and takes them on. However, Auru is suspicious and he persuades Yann to keep an eye on them: maybe they"re up to no good…

programme.title: FURRY VENGEANCE
programme.desc: A real estate developer must oversee the construction of green housing development in the Oregon woods. But a furry rebellion, led by a raccoon, stands in the way of his project.

programme.title: ADVENTURE TIME S2

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Auru and Clarissa get caught in a storm and are stranded on a desert island. They have to survive until rescue arrives. Auru tries to reassure Clarissa and shows proof of a great deal of ingenuity to make their desert island as comfortable as possible. For the first time, Clarissa begins to appreciate Auru"s qualities. But when he goes to fetch wood, Auru makes a shattering discovery. Are they really on a desert island? And should he tell Clarissa?

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Kai, Timeti"s little cousin, spots a dangerous snake on Maotou. Yann, Timeti and Auru decide to track it so that it cannot bite anyone. While they are gone, Marina is left to look after Kai. But while the kids are preparing Raoul"s bath, he runs away and falls into the sea. The little koala then goes through an incredible adventure that will put him on the trail of the snake.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Auru is presented with Heremoana, a necklace of black coral symbolizing maturity. However, during a trip out to sea with his friends, Auru loses the necklace, which is retrieved by Taniwah, the giant squid that haunts the depths of Maotou. When they try to recover it, our heroes discover the unbelievable truth about this legendary monster.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Maeva is devastated. Unless she can pay a sky-high fine following a visit by a bizarre inspector, her restaurant has to close. Then Van Krook offers to pay the fine for her, but on condition that her restaurant becomes a fast-food joint! Maeva has no choice and agrees, but Yann and his friends have their doubts. What if this is all a set-up?

programme.title: ALVIN AND THE CHIPMUNKS: THE ROAD CHIP
programme.desc: Believing that they will be abandoned by their human friend after he proposes to his girlfriend, the chipmunks have three days to stop the proposal.

programme.title: JACK THE GIANT SLAYER
programme.desc: An epic twist of the classic tale where Jack climbs the beanstalk and battles marauding giants.

programme.title: EMMA.
programme.desc: Handsome, clever, and rich, Emma Woodhouse is a restless queen bee without rivals in her sleepy little town. In this glittering satire of social class and the pain of growing up, Emma must adventure through misguided matches and romantic missteps to find the love that has been there all along.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Auru and Clarissa get caught in a storm and are stranded on a desert island. They have to survive until rescue arrives. Auru tries to reassure Clarissa and shows proof of a great deal of ingenuity to make their desert island as comfortable as possible. For the first time, Clarissa begins to appreciate Auru"s qualities. But when he goes to fetch wood, Auru makes a shattering discovery. Are they really on a desert island? And should he tell Clarissa?

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Kai, Timeti"s little cousin, spots a dangerous snake on Maotou. Yann, Timeti and Auru decide to track it so that it cannot bite anyone. While they are gone, Marina is left to look after Kai. But while the kids are preparing Raoul"s bath, he runs away and falls into the sea. The little koala then goes through an incredible adventure that will put him on the trail of the snake.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Auru is presented with Heremoana, a necklace of black coral symbolizing maturity. However, during a trip out to sea with his friends, Auru loses the necklace, which is retrieved by Taniwah, the giant squid that haunts the depths of Maotou. When they try to recover it, our heroes discover the unbelievable truth about this legendary monster.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2

programme.title: ALVIN AND THE CHIPMUNKS: THE ROAD CHIP
programme.desc: Believing that they will be abandoned by their human friend after he proposes to his girlfriend, the chipmunks have three days to stop the proposal.

programme.desc: A streetwise New York City pigeon teams up with a good-hearted statue to help the city"s poor.

programme.title: EMMA.
programme.desc: Handsome, clever, and rich, Emma Woodhouse is a restless queen bee without rivals in her sleepy little town. In this glittering satire of social class and the pain of growing up, Emma must adventure through misguided matches and romantic missteps to find the love that has been there all along.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: For some time, the sea level has been rising. Maeva"s restaurant is flooding and the waves are getting increasingly large and dangerous. Yann is concerned: something odd is going on. To make matters worse, Ramana reveals that a prophecy predicts the total destruction of Maotou following the appearance of a "star". Yann and his friends are puzzled: what is this star Ramana is talking about? They have to act fast, there"s not much time left to save Maotou!

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Van Krook and his henchmen have to leave the yacht for a while. Clarissa is over the moon: she"s going to hold a mega-party on board her uncle"s boat. Auru is all for it, but Yann and Timeti are not so easily persuaded. Having a party on their sworn enemy"s yacht is probably not a good idea, but they are dying to know what is taking Van Krook away from his precious vessel. They decide to investigate as the party really rocks.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Due to a blunder by Clarissa, Ramana is plunged into a deep sleep. Only one thing can arouse him from his slumber: touching "Poemari", the legendary pearl that has protected the island for centuries. Yann and his friends search for the pearl to save Ramana. However, Clarissa informs her uncle, Van Krook, of the existence of Poemari. The millionaire sets Biff and Rico on our heroes" trail to steal it from them.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Biff and Rico have stolen the Poemari pearl and the island"s volcano has awoken. Maotou will disappear beneath the lava if our heroes cannot recover the legendary pearl fast. They have to get it back from the clutches of Van Krook. Thanks to Clarissa will they be able to persuade him to save Maotou and wake Ramana up?

programme.desc: Drac falls for the intriguing-yet-dangerous captain of the ship. Balancing family, friends, and a budding romance might just be too much, even for the most powerful vampire.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: In an act of clumsiness, Timeti breaks the scepter belonging to Ramana, who is teaching her to become a shaman. She tries to cover her blunder with a crude repair job. However, when Ramana performs the ritual to call the dolphins, he starts to act… like a dolphin! He swims and clicks like Zoom. The alarmed villagers try to find some solution. Timeti has to make up for her mistake without arousing their suspicions.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Billy, a baby orca born in captivity, is handed over to Uncle Patrick to prepare him for a return to the wild. However, Billy is high-spirited and playful and creates havoc in the village. Papa-Tuanaku gives Patrick a short deadline to get the orca ready to fend for himself far from human beings. Yann, Zoom and their friends have to teach him how to fish for himself and not go too close to sharks--the sworn enemies of orcas. Fortunately, Zoom is on hand to "support" Billy through his difficult apprenticeship.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: When Yann, Auru, Marina and Timeti decide to spend the night under the stars, their attention is grabbed by strange lights in the sky. When they see the lights plummet down off the coast of Maotou, our heroes decide to go see what it is and discover an incredible alien-like creature! Yann and his friends need to discover the truth about this weird phenomenon quickly before panic seizes Maotou.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Clarissa, Van Krook"s niece, arrives to spend the vacation aboard her uncle"s yacht. But she"s bored and dreams of making new friends. She then meets Yann and Zoom and falls under Yann"s charm. Yann introduces her to Timeti and Auru. They don"t yet know that she is the niece of their sworn enemy. Clarissa does all she can to prevent her new friends from finding out.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Igor, the dolphin soldier, is back. Auru, who formed a special bond with him, is undoubtedly the happiest to see him again. However, joy quickly turns to concern when Igor takes Zoom off with him. He wants to show him something: the sonars of the dolphins living around the island are disturbed and they end up beaching themselves. Even Zoom is affected by this strange sickness. Time is short so Yann and his friends need to discover the cause quickly.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Yann discovers a Maui dolphin that appears to be lost and starving. It"s an extremely rare species and, not knowing anything about its diet, Yann decides to use a engine designed by himself to create a robot capable of observing fellow dolphins to discover what they eat. However, perhaps Yann should have listened to Uncle Patrick"s warnings that his engine might be too dangerous?

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Marina has brought her little friends back to the Galleon and she"s delighted with the idea of showing them her toys. But the kids only have eyes for Yann. So, to show off, Marina persuades them that she knows how to pilot the "Turtle", Uncle Patrick"s submersible. She offers to give them a tour, but the little gang gets stuck inside and they head off of a thrill-packed tour of the Maotou abyss. Yann, Zoom and friends have to intervene fast to get them out of the jam.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Jack returns to Maotou in his seaplane accompanied by Jackpot, a little dog he"s adopted. However, following a technical mishap, his plane crashes into the sea. Jack manages to get to a desert island, but Jackpot has disappeared. Fortunately, he is found by Zoom, who returns him to Yann and friends. Jackpot turns out to be a real whirlwind. Will our heroes realize that Jack is his owner and that he needs rescuing?

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Timeti"s mother, Maeva, has great news for her daughter. Timeti"s been accepted into a top cooking school. She will be leaving Maotou to become a great chef. But Timeti isn"t sure she really wants to do that. At a loss, she seeks support from Yann, but, due to a misunderstanding, Yann actually precipitates Timeti"s departure. He"s left with no choice: he has to declare his feelings in the hope that she will stay.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: For some days now, the waters of Maotou have been disturbed. Yann is concerned and decides to alert Papa-Tuanaku. When he gets to the village he discovers Clarissa, Van Krook"s niece, handing out gadgets to the villagers. Hypnotized by their tablets, they don"t listen to Yann when he tries to warn them of an ecological disaster threatening the atoll"s beaches. Could there be some connection between this phenomenon and these new gifts?

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: A bizarre phenomenon is creating panic in Maotou"s waters. At a precise location, airplanes" electronics go haywire and huge whirlpools almost suck in ships. Yann and his friends decide to investigate. Auru is convinced that it"s all his fault because he ate the offerings intended for Tumura Ifenua, the octopus-goddess who slumbers in the darkest depths of Maotou.

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Biff and Rico have had enough of Van Krook"s never-ending insults. This time, they"re handing in their notice! They go to see Maeva, who"s gone into the home-delivered meal business and offer their services as delivery men. Maeva hesitates, but finally gives them a second chance and takes them on. However, Auru is suspicious and he persuades Yann to keep an eye on them: maybe they"re up to no good…

programme.title: ZOOM, THE WHITE DOLPHIN S2
programme.desc: Auru and Clarissa get caught in a storm and are stranded on a desert island. They have to survive until rescue arrives. For the first time, Clarissa begins to appreciate Auru"s qualities. But when he goes to fetch wood, Auru makes a shattering discovery. Are they really on a desert island? programme.title: ADVENTURE TIME S2

programme.title: ADVENTURE TIME S2
programme.desc: A weirdo horse keeps Finn and Jake from getting the sleep they so desperately need.

programme.title: ADVENTURE TIME S2
programme.desc: Finn must go have a grand adventure to have a story to tell Jake who"s home sick in bed.

programme.title: HAPPILY EVER AFTER: FAIRY TALES FOR EVERY CHILD S3
